Reviews.Title: D3200 is Nikon at it's Best!
Reviews.Author: tommydoc99
Reviews.Content: I recently ordered a new red D3200 with a two lens bundle including the standard 18-55mm VR and optional 55-300mm VR zoom/telephoto. At a little under $900.00 it wasn't cheap, but wasn't overly expensive either. It replaced my D3100 and hasn't disappointed! Light and quick are both words that come to mind... Having the owner's guide preset on the viewer is handy. The only appreciable disappointment is that the wi-fi feature is limited to operating systems on smart phones and newer tablets, but not any standard windows applications such as Win8 which my laptop is pre-loaded with. So it's back to the good ol' usb hardwire just like all the older models. Another quirk is that the data cable is proprietary to Nikon, thus no stopping by for a replacement at the local discount chain store. The red body is absolutely gorgeous to boot! So if you're in the market for a camera with this set of features, definitely check out a red one! This is the fourth Nikon I've owned and it's the best of the bunch.

Reviews.Title: Catching the sensation. Loving the moment.
Reviews.Author: Sylvester Butler Junior
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much Amazon for having this Nikon D3200 DSLR available at the price it was for the holidays. I was finally able to upgrade to the kind of digital performance I'd been wanting to for some time.  This camera has changed the look of my perspectives and given so,,, much more clearity and add noteably more detail to all of my photo and media subjects. I whole heartitly recommend the Nikon D3200 DSLR to any and everyone looking for a satisfying experience in film and picture taking.  Thank you very much.The Eclectic Eye.

Reviews.Title: Best buy for the money.
Reviews.Author: Verdict
Reviews.Content: Light, easy to hold, nice looking at a great price. Comes with a 55mm-300mm zoom lens, which sold separately  is around $400.00. Takes beautiful pictures.
